original_text: The Lord made the groups of stars called Pleiades and Orion. The Lord changes the night into dawn, and he changes the day back to night again. He takes the water in the sea, and he pours it out as rain on the earth. The Lord is his name!
korean_text: 묘성과 삼성을 만드시며 사망의 그늘을 아침으로 바꾸시고 낮을 어두운 밤으로 바꾸시며 바닷물을 불러 지면에 쏟으시는 이를 찾으라 그의 이름은 여호와시니라

sentences.original_text: The Lord made the groups of stars called Pleiades
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서는 플레이아데스라 불리는 별 무리들을 만드셨고

sentences.original_text: The Lord changes the night into dawn
and he changes the day back to night again
He takes the water in the sea
and he pours it out as rain on the earth
